name: Around Me
description:
Story:

Omi was out traveling when all of a sudden they crashed their house into an unknown dream world! It'll be tough to make it back, but don't worry. They've got time on their side!


Controls:
  • Arrow Keys = Move left/right
  • Z = Jump
  • X = Dash in midair
  • Left Shift = Speed up time
Tips:
  • You can double jump and dash all in the same jump! The first one of these you do will gain a boost from your friend Cherubaki.
  • You can speed up time at any point, even if Omi hasn't spawned in yet.
  • Whenever you get stuck, think about everything that's possible, both with your movement abilities and the ability to speed up time.
  • Every level is able to be cleared on the first cycle.
  • If you ever need to restart the game, just press the Escape Key.
  • Take your time. Believe in moderation.
